Todays Birthday Oct PERIOD  PERIOD Something about your home has been a source of irritation but for some reason or another there was nothing you could do about it PERIOD Well thats changed PERIOD Youll see PERIOD Just face the problem squarely and the action you can take will become obvious PERIOD Dont be inhibited by the people youve convinced that this was hard PERIOD When things start rolling itll be easy.To get the advantage check the days rating  is the easiest day  the most challenging.Aries March 21April   Today is a   You like to get the best of everything but its expensive PERIOD Youll need help in order to afford it PERIOD A creative partner would sure come in handy now PERIOD Choose one who believes in your dream and can help you find the money.Taurus April 20May   Today is a   Is someone trying to make your life more difficult Dont stand for it PERIOD Dont lose your job either unless its time to move on PERIOD If you decide it is time to go make sure you get a nice severance package PERIOD Dont just quit.Gemini May 21June   Today is a   It doesnt hurt to have a good strategy especially when youre nearly overwhelmed PERIOD You need to set priorities PERIOD Figure out what really needs to be done and what doesnt PERIOD A few minutes spent doing this now saves you both time and money later.Cancer June 22July   Today is a   Is your mind saying one thing while your feelings say another thing This time choose both PERIOD The answer youre after wont go against your intuition PERIOD Your mind and your gut will agree on this one.Leo July 23Aug PERIOD   Today is a   Even though things are going well your energy is sapped PERIOD You may wish you could stay home in bed PERIOD Schedule that for tomorrow and over the weekend PERIOD Meanwhile keep gnawing at that mountain of work in front of you PERIOD Youll somehow find the strength and youll sleep better once its done.Virgo Aug PERIOD 23Sept PERIOD   Today is a   Youre learning quickly and not just from reading books PERIOD Youre picking up on subtle innuendoes PERIOD If youd like to respond to some but arent sure how relax PERIOD Your instincts should be working well.Libra Sept PERIOD 23Oct   Today is a   Continue to ask for what you want and mean it PERIOD If others are used to pushing you around theyre in for a big surprise PERIOD Dont ask for gifts PERIOD Just ask for fair compensation  and get it in writing.Scorpio Oct PERIOD 23Nov PERIOD   Today is a   An option that seemed impossible or blocked simply may not have been ripe yet PERIOD Whatever you needed wasnt available before but it is now PERIOD Ask again.Sagittarius Nov PERIOD 22Dec PERIOD   Today is a   Try not to spend all day on the phone PERIOD Not on personal calls anyway PERIOD Of course you have to make arrangements for the weekend PERIOD A gettogether with the whole gang would be perfectCapricorn Dec PERIOD 22Jan PERIOD   Today is a   Something you couldnt do alone looks possible with help from a few friends PERIOD Its not just that they can take over some of the chores knowing theyre with you is energizing.Aquarius Jan PERIOD 20Feb PERIOD   Today is a   Something you thought would work well ends up not working PERIOD Back to the old drawing board PERIOD Your love life should be improving however PERIOD Make a date for tomorrow.Pisces Feb PERIOD 19March   Today is an   A gettogether with friends is highly recommended PERIOD Romance could be a fringe benefit PERIOD If you already have a date great If not the odds of meeting a significant other are high.Tribune Media Services
